department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
description: Work under this Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) includes the provision of skilled licensed labour, tools, equipment, transportation, supervision and materials as requested by National Defence (DND) in the form of call-ups for installation, repairs and maintenance of electrical systems
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Electrical Installation, Repairs, and Maintenance

![](https://picsum.photos/200/300?url=https://example.com)

### Reference

* Reference Number:WS3561330998- Document 3765990926
* Solicitation Number: WS3561330998
* Amendment Number: 2

### Tender Details

* Tender Closing Date: January 13, 2023, at 12:00 PM MST
* Expected Contract Start Date: October 1, 2022
* Expected Contract End Date: September 30, 2026

### Procurement Information

* Procurement Category: CNST
* Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contracting Entity Information

* Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address:
  11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
  Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
* End User Entities:
  Department of National Defence (DND)
  101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2

### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a contractor for the provision of skilled labour, tools, equipment, transportation, supervision, and materials for the installation, repairs, and maintenance of electrical systems at Det Shilo, Shilo, Manitoba. The contract will be for a term of two (2) years, with an option to extend for two additional one-year periods. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the tender closing date.

### Contact Information

* Contact Name: Ben Wong (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: ben.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Please note that the contracting entity recommends visiting the Ariba Discovery website for the most up-to-date information and to submit your bid. [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14753933?extsite=MTQ3NTM5MzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14753933?extsite=MTQ3NTM5MzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
